name: Lung Fish
description:
You play as a fish who can't breathe underwater because he has lungs instead of gills, but not to worry! You have your trusty bubble wand, which can fend of enemies, and help you breathe!

HOW TO PLAY
Shoot bubbles:  left click
Jump:  spacebar (you can jump off the ground to swim)
Move:  A and D
Speed up descent:  S

Shoot bubbles to hit enemies, pick up bubbles to replenish air.
Don't get hit or run out of air!

Try to beat my high score of 166 seconds!

Music: Evan King - Tundra
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw?
https://contextsensitive.bandcamp.com/
